mapper.select: SELECT '1' as status, c.open_id as openId, d.`code` as skuSeq, d.`code` as giftSeq, b.grno as grno, e.card_id as cardId FROM coupon_member a LEFT JOIN coupon_setting b ON a.coupon_setting_id = b.id LEFT JOIN member c ON a.member_id = c.id LEFT JOIN coupon d ON a.coupon_id = d.id LEFT JOIN member_profile e ON a.member_id = e.member_id WHERE a.push_status = 0 AND a.`status` = 0 AND b.gift_type = #{giftType}
SELECT a.* FROM coupon_member a LEFT JOIN coupon b ON a.coupon_id = b.id LEFT JOIN member c ON c.id = a.member_id WHERE b.`code`= #{code} AND c.open_id = #{openId}

SELECT a.coupon_id AS couponId, b.id AS couponSettingId, c.activity_id AS activityId FROM coupon_member a LEFT JOIN coupon_setting b ON a.coupon_setting_id = b.id LEFT JOIN activity_coupon_setting c ON b.id = c.coupon_setting_id LEFT JOIN coupon d ON a.coupon_id = d.id
where d.`code` = #{code}
